text:
Had chance to praise work today of @Fiona_Kinghorn + @CV_UHB in preparing for #Covid19 #Vaccine roll-out. 

Good to get cast-iron guarantee from @MattHancock that *all* #Vaccines will be distributed *equitably* across UK - working with @WelshGovernment 

https://t.co/nD4pDPmaS2 https://t.co/4WZlf1bsSz
